> Trần Hoàng Huy – Software Engineer Portfolio

## Who

Full Name: Trần Hoàng Huy (also known as Tran Hoang Huy, huykg1112)
Role: Software Engineer / Full-Stack Developer
Location: Cần Thơ, Việt Nam
Education: Kỹ thuật phần mềm – Đại học Cần Thơ (Can Tho University), graduating 2025
Current employer: Teknix Corporation (Developer Intern, 2025–present)
Email: huyth.dev@gmail.com
GitHub: https://github.com/huykg1112
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hoang-huy-tran-23baa6358

## What

This is the personal portfolio website of Trần Hoàng Huy, showcasing his
software engineering work, projects, technical skills and career history.

## Technical Skills

Primary: Next.js, React, NestJS, TypeScript, JavaScript
Styling: Tailwind CSS, CSS Modules
Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL
APIs: RESTful, GraphQL
AI/ML: PhoBERT (fine-tuned NLP model for Vietnamese crop disease diagnosis)
CMS: WordPress, Elementor
DevOps: Git, GitHub, Docker, Vercel
Other: Framer Motion, Prisma

## Work Experience

1. Developer Intern — Teknix Corporation (Sep 2025 – present)
   Build and maintain websites for international dental clinics using WordPress and Next.js.

2. Developer Intern — Green Space Solution (Jun 2025 – Aug 2025)
   Contributed to AutoTMS project, optimized UI and integrated data modules.

3. IT Intern — UTA Co., Ltd (Jun 2024 – Apr 2025)
   Developed an AI pest diagnosis system using PhoBERT with ~97% accuracy.
   Optimized web apps for PagoSolution and IECES projects.

4. AI & Front-End Developer — PagoSolution / UTA (Jul 2024 – Apr 2025)
   Built AI pest diagnosis system; optimized UI with ReactJS, NestJS, GraphQL.

5. Front-End Developer — IECES Project (Oct 2024 – Nov 2024)
   Implemented responsive Figma designs using WordPress & Elementor.

## Projects

### E-Commerce Farm Project (Bachelor's Thesis)
- Tech: Next.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, PhoBERT (fine-tuned from PhoBERT)
- Description: AI-powered agricultural e-commerce platform. The AI model predicts
  crop disease names and treatment plans from text with ~97% accuracy.
- Repo: https://github.com/huykg1112/project-ecommerce-farm

### Portfolio Website
- Tech: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Vercel
- Description: This portfolio site, featuring smooth animations and responsive design.

### Booking Homestay
- Tech: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL
- Description: Property booking platform for clients, landlords and admins.
